name: Volatile Valkyrie
description:
An unlikely combination of arcade legends Rastan and Bubble Bobble. Use double jumps, air blocks, down slams and other acrobatics to fly across classic one-screen levels full of monsters and treasure.

Grab mighty weapons that seem to run out at the worst times, bounce enemy projectiles away with well timed blocks, and dodge terrible void ghosts that showed up because you took too long to kill the monsters.

Plays best with gamepad but works with kb/mouse as well.
